TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VirtualPathExtension extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.IExtension`1<class System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase>
Public NotInheritable Class VirtualPathExtension Implements IExtension(Of ServiceHostBase)

summary.span: Contém o caminho virtual do serviço quando o serviço é hospedado no IIS (Serviços de Informações da Internet) ou no WAS (Serviço de Ativação de Processos do Windows).

span.span: Contains the service's virtual path when the service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Process Activation Service (WAS).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationVirtualPath As String
public: property System::String ^ ApplicationVirtualPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Obtém o caminho virtual do aplicativo IIS ou WAS que hospeda o serviço do WCF.

span.span: Gets the virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the WCF service.

value.span: O caminho virtual do aplicativo IIS ou do WAS que hospeda o serviço.

span.span: The virtual path of the IIS or WAS application that hosts the service.

param.name: owner
param.span: O que usa o caminho virtual.

summary.span: Esse método é fornecido para dar suporte à infraestrutura do WCF (Windows Communication Foundation).

span.span: This method is provided to support the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método dá suporte à infraestrutura do WCF e não se destina a ser chamado diretamente no seu código.This method supports the WCF infrastructure and is not intended to be called directly from your code.
